mapper.insert: insert into orders( order_id, order_date, order_request, total_price, payment, delivery_address, delivery_address_detail, zip, user_id, order_name, order_phone, order_sprice, p_id, delivery_status, total_amount ) values( #{order_id}, systimestamp, #{order_request}, #{total_price}, #{payment}, #{delivery_address}, #{delivery_address_detail}, #{zip}, #{user_id}, #{order_name}, #{order_phone}, #{order_sprice}, #{p_id}, '배송준비중', #{total_amount} )
mapper.select: select order_id, order_name, order_phone, order_date, order_request, delivery_address, delivery_address_detail, payment, total_price, order_sprice from orders where order_id = #{order_id}

select o.order_id, o.order_date, o.delivery_status, o.p_id, o.total_amount, p.p_name, p.p_price, photos.photo_id, photos.photo_oname, photos.photo_sname, photos.photo_type, photos.photo_role from orders o, products p, photos where o.user_id = #{user_id} and o.p_id = p.p_id and p.p_id = photos.p_id and photos.photo_role = 'main' order by o.order_date desc
